original_title: 女子大生レズ 暴姦の罠
overview: The industrial group's boss, Fujita, has used bad means for the prosperity of his company. In recent years, he tried to take over a rival company, but failed, and he was noticed by the prosecution. He was driving to a villa in the mountains to destroy evidence, and on the way he encountered a fallen woman, Tomoko, and took him with him.  After learning that Tomoko, who had regained consciousness, tried to commit suicide, Fujita sympathized a little and offered a guidepost to live as a concubine if she wanted to die anyway. Push Tomoko who resists to the bed and fulfill her desire.  The next day, the company contacts me and finds out that I'm going to get rid of it. Fujita, who is impatient, tries to return immediately, but when Tomoko, who has become obedient overnight, sees her carrying coffee in a naked apron, she forgets to go home and plays with her and tastes it again.
title: Joshi daisei les: Bôkan no wana
